== Thachanattukara-I (627625) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Thachanattukara-I is a village in the [[Mannarkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 2306 hectares and harbouring 3545 households with total population of 18864 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Perinthalmanna]] is at a distance of 20 km. Male population is 9255 and female population is 9609. Scheduled Caste Population is 2208 and Scheduled Tribes population is 31. Census Location Code of the village is 627625<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 15299 (81.1%)
* Literate male population: 7632 (82.46%)
* Literate female population: 7667 (79.79%)
